definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: and f. five (NH id.; id.; Aram. [[חֲמֵשׁ]], [[חַמְשָׁא]], h.ame4, h.ame4to0; Ph. [[חמשת]]; Palm. [[חמשא]], c. n. masc., Reckendorf:ZMG 1888, 408; As ḫamšu, ḫamiltu Dl:§ 75; Eth. xams:, xamst:: Ar. xamsun, xamsah;un Sab. & Liḥyân. [[חַמס]] DHM:ZMG xxix, 613; Epigr. Denkm. 71, 73);—

definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: ) abs. [[חָמֵשׁ]] Ge 5:6 + 94 t. + Ez Eze 40:30 (del. LXXB Hi-Sm Co; Co del. also in v:Eze 40:25, v:Eze 40:29, v:Eze 40:33, v:Eze 40:36) + Ez Eze 45:3 Kt (where rd.

definitions.title: f.
definitions.body: with Qr); cstr. [[חֲמֵשׁ]] Ge 5:10 + 67 t. + Ez Eze 48:16 Kt;

definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: ) abs. [[חֲמִשָּׁה]] v. Lag:BN 80 Ge 18:28 + 139 t. (incl. Ez Eze 8:16 del. B Co al.); cstr. [[חֲמֵשֶׁת]] Nu 3:47, Nu 3:47 + 26 t.;—on pl. [[חֲמִשִּׁים]] fifty, see below;—five, in Hex. chiefly P;—

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: [[חָמֵשׁ]] before fpl. noun Ge 43:34 + 35 t.; before n. coll. [[חאׁן]] ´[[ח]] 1Sa 25:18; v. also [[בָּאַמָּה]] ´[[ח]] five in cubit (s) = five cubits 1Ki 7:23, 1Ch 11:23, 2Ch 4:2; after noun (late) 2Ki 8:16 ([[בִּשְׁנַת חָמֵשׁ לְיוֹרָם]] = in the fifth year) + 6 t. Ch; no noun expr. 1Ki 7:39, 1Ki 7:39, 1Ki 7:49, 1Ki 7:49, 1Ch 3:20, 2Ch 4:7, 2Ch 4:7.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: [[חֲמִשָּׁה]] before mpl. noun Ge 47:2 + 18 t.; after noun Ex 36:38 + 36 t. Nu (all P); no noun expr. Ge 14:9 (only here c. art.) + 20 t.

definitions.title: e.
definitions.body: = ordinal, [[בִּשְׁנַת חָמֵשׁ ליורם]] 2Ki 8:16 the fifth (year) of Joram; [[בַּחֲמִשָּׁה לַחׂדֶשׁ]] on the fifth (day) of the month Ez Eze 1:1, Eze 1:2, Eze 8:1, Eze 33:21; (so also 15th, 25th, etc.)

definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: ), (1) after noun Es 9:21; (2) before noun Ex 16:1 ( = ordinal fifteenth, so Le 23:6 + ) Ho 3:2 +.

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: [[חֲמֵשֶׁת עָשָׂר]], without n. = ordinal fifteenth 1Ch 24:14 + 4 t. + Ez Eze 45:12 (rd. [[חֲמִשִּׁים]] A Hi Co).

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: [[חָמֵשׁ]] before larger numeral: (1) noun repeated Ge 5:6 + 4 t.; (2) noun with 2nd num. only, Ge 5:17 + 8 t. + Ez Eze 45:3 Kt; (3) noun c. [[בְּ]] with 2nd num. Ez Eze 40:21 + 2 t.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: [[חָמֵשׁ]] after larger num.: (1) noun repeated Ge 25:7; (2) noun foll. ´[[ח]] (only) Ju Jdg 14:10 + (esp. in expressions of age and duration); (3) noun before both num., st. abs., 2Ch 3:15; st. cstr. 2Ch 15:19.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: no noun expr., ´[[ח]] between other num., e.g. [[ושׁבעים]] ´[[שֵׁשׁ מאות ח]] Nu 31:37.

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: [[חֲמִשָּׁה]] before larger num., noun foll. larger num. Nu 1:25 + 22 t.

definitions.title: e.
definitions.body: ´[[ח]] follows, and (1) is foll. by noun Ju Jdg 20:35 + 7 t.; (2) noun precedes both 1Ki 7:3, Je 52:30.

definitions.title: h.
definitions.body: no noun expr. ´[[ח]] between other num. Ex 38:28, Ezr 2:5.
